text: Ani musacya janasamuhane tyancya pascata apalya dagin'yanni eka vasaru banavuna tyala upasya daivata banavile, jo eka akara matra hota jyata eka avaja (dhvani) hota. Kaya tyanni he nahi pahile ki te (vasaru) tyancyasi bolatahi navhate ani na tyanna margadarsana karita hote tyala tyanni (daivata) banavile ani mothe an'yayace krtya kele
